name: Relyscraper
description:
Entry for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2019 Game Jam. Relyscraper is a puzzle-platformer with only one platform. In the game, you must maneuver both your character and the platform on which you stand, relying on only one platform to reach each goal.

Controls:

W / Space - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Arrow Keys - Slide Platform
